modName: The Sky Wars - Star Wars in Skyrim
summary:
Swtor. Just. Better.
... main reason i made this mod.

jk
descriptionHtml:
[center]                                    [img]https://copy.com/MZfeKLFFY2Kk[/img][/center]


[center]  [color=#ff3333][size=7] [i][b]WIP[/b][/i][/size][/color][/center]


[center]
[quote][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50499/?]DOWNLOAD STANDALONE VADER ARMOR HERE[/url][/quote]

I have recently gotten permission from Kryptonian to use his stuff[/center]
[center](Just a heads up)[/center]


[center][color=#ff6633][size=4][font=Arial Black][b][i]This mod is no where close to be finished (because i plan on making it so big) But i will still be releasing small downloads, so you can get a little preview of whats to come.  [/i][/b][/font][/size]
[/color][/center]




[center][color=#cc9933][size=4][font=Arial Black][b][i]Required Mods:[/i][/b][/font][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#cc9933][size=4][font=Arial Black][b][i]Apachii [/i][/b][/font][/size][/color][color=#cc9933][size=4][font=Arial Black][b][i]Skyhair (For Obi-Wan not to be ba[/i][/b][/font][/size][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i]ld)[/i][/font][/size][/b][/color][/center]


[center][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i][color=#cc9933]Magicka Sabers (For Lightsabers)[/color][/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i][color=#cc9933]Tropical Skyrim (Not really required but highly recommended)[/color][/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i][color=#cc9933][img]https://copy.com/HocJ7b3I3M3b[/img]
[/color][/i][/font][/size][/b][/center]


[center][color=#ffcc33][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i]This mod turns Skyrim into a whole new starwars game![/i][/font][/size][/b]
[/color][/center]
[center][color=#ffcc33][size=2][font=Arial Black][b][i](By replacing all the standard skyrim stuff)[/i][/b][/font][/size]
[/color][/center]




[center][color=#ffcc33][b][size=4][font=Arial Black][i]As of right now, there is not much to do in the mod except:[/i][/font][/size][/b]
[/color][/center]

[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Killing Civilians[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Being Darth Vader[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Shoot with Blasters[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Being Palpatine[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Being Jango Fett, Boba Fett[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i](And your own custom Mandalorian Bounty Hunter)[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Pretend to be Anakin Skywalker by putting on his robes.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Laughing at the guards cause they are Clone troopers.[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]Finding glitches [/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i]:)[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#ff3333][size=4][b][i][img]https://copy.com/4jOPo6KC9Ldi[/img]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
author: Titan
